org.gbif.dwca.io

Class DwcaWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.dwca.io.DwcaWriter

  • public class DwcaWriter
extends Object
    Simple writer class to create valid dwc archives using tab data files. The meta.xml descriptor is generated automatically and an optional EML metadata document can be added. The archive is NOT compressed but the final product is a directory with all the necessary files. For usage of this class please @see DwcaWriterTest.

      • DwcaWriter

        public DwcaWriter(org.gbif.dwc.terms.Term coreRowType,
          File dir,
          boolean useHeaders)
           throws IOException
        If headers are used the first record must include all terms ever used for that file. If in subsequent rows additional terms are introduced an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        coreRowType - the core row type
        dir - the directory to create the archive in
        useHeaders - if true the first row in every data file will include headers
        Throws:
        IOException

      • DwcaWriter

        public DwcaWriter(org.gbif.dwc.terms.Term coreRowType,
          org.gbif.dwc.terms.Term coreIdTerm,
          File dir,
          boolean useHeaders)
           throws IOException
        If headers are used the first record must include all terms ever used for that file. If in subsequent rows additional terms are introduced an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        coreRowType - the core row type
        coreIdTerm - the term of the id column
        dir - the directory to create the archive in
        useHeaders - if true the first row in every data file will include headers
        Throws:
        IOException
